message: Starting database performance investigation focusing on component_parameters operations (140-189ms) and machine state dual table issues
Analyzed parent agent findings - confirmed critical database performance issues: 140-189ms operations, component_parameters bottlenecks, 72% dual table inconsistency. Beginning deep dive analysis.

Analyzed dual table pattern in executor.py - confirmed non-atomic updates causing inconsistency. Found separate async calls to machines (lines 203-207) and machine_state (lines 210-216) tables with potential race conditions.

DATABASE PERFORMANCE INVESTIGATION COMPLETE: Identified root causes of 140-189ms latency - N+1 queries in component_parameters, dual table race conditions, missing indexes. Deployed optimization specialist for implementation strategy. Analysis confirms critical bottlenecks and provides actionable solutions.
